## IF

```jl
if *condition 1*
    *option 1*
elseif *condition 2*
    *option 2*
else
    *option 3*
end
```

## Ternary operators

```jl
a ? b : c
```

Translate to

```jl
if a
    b
else
    c
end
```

::: {.cell execution_count=4}
``` {.julia .cell-code}
what_is_larger(x, y) = x > y ? "$x is larger than $y" : "$y is larger than $x" 

what_is_larger(1, 2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4}
```
"2 is larger than 1"
```
:::
